snippet: The supercluster of galaxies that includes the Milky Way was outlined and named Laniakea, Hawaiian for “immense heaven.”
abstract: Dr R Brent Tully study in journal Nature reports that astronomers have for first time outlined and named network of galaxies that includes Milky Way; network has been named Laniakea, which is Hawaiian for 'immense heaven.'
lead_paragraph: The supercluster of galaxies that includes the Milky Way was outlined and named Laniakea, Hawaiian for “immense heaven.”

headline.main: Giving the Milky Way a New Sense of Place
headline.print_headline: Astronomy: Giving the Milky Way a New Sense of Place
